scripts.docs-wiki-build: typedoc --githubPages false  --disableSources --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --excludeNotDocumented --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --hideBreadcrumbs --entryDocument api_ref.md --readme none --hideGenerator --sort source-order --exclude ./**/src/index.ts --out ../../documentation/docs/references/types ./src/index.ts
